alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Guadalupe; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:42PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caldwell, Hays and north central Guadalupe Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodcreek, or near Wimberley, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Marcos, Kyle, Buda, Lockhart, Dripping Springs, Wimberley, Woodcreek, Martindale, Uhland, Niederwald, Staples, Driftwood, Fentress, Mountain City, San Marcos Regional Airport, Maxwell, Reedville, Redwood and Hays City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central Texas.
